text:
Two #BioNTech #vaccine candidates, based on mRNAs for the glycoprotein spike of #SARSCoV2 and lipid nanoparticles, in mice elicit a dose-dependent #antibody response and strong T-cell responses and protect macaques. Phase 1/2 trials are ongoing.
https://t.co/mUc6fa7E0X #COVID19 https://t.co/1RJkwiplCc
